comments:
Greetings:

I have installed the latest stable version of the eclipse platform tools Web
Standards Tools version.  I am running it on linux and it does not want to start
up.  There is a conflict with one of the jar files in the eclipse tools stack. 
I will print the log file below to see if anyone there is able to help
troubleshoot this issue further. 

Thanks.

The root of the problem seems to be:

/usr/local/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.core.runtime/.manager/.fileTableLock
(Permission denied)

Do you have write permission to this location in your file system?

Are specifying specific any options in your config.ini, in the eclipse.ini or on
the command line?
What is the file system type on which /usr/local/eclipse is installed?

No further information from originator.  This configuration appears to work 
for others.  Closing.  Please reopen if there is more information.
